channel.title: ScanX – IPO News
channel.description: Auto-generated feed for ScanX IPO News

item.title: ICICI Prudential AMC Announces IPO: 5% Shares Reserved for ICICI Bank Shareholders
item.description: Top News ICICI Prudential AMC Announces IPO: 5% Shares Reserved for ICICI Bank Shareholders 3 hours ago ICICI Prudential Asset Management Company is launching an IPO of 48,972,994 equity shares with a price band of ₹2,061 - ₹2,165 per share. The IPO will open on December 12, 2025, and close on December 16, 2025. A special reservation of up to 2,448,649 equity shares (5% of total offer) is set aside for eligible ICICI Bank shareholders, with a minimum bid of 6 shares and a maximum bid of 90 shares. This move provides ICICI Bank shareholders a preferential opportunity to invest in the AMC's growth.

item.title: Equitas Small Finance Bank's Credit Ratings Affirmed, Balance Sheet Shows Robust Growth
item.description: Equitas Small Finance Bank's Credit Ratings Affirmed, Balance Sheet Shows Robust Growth 3 hours ago India Ratings and Research has reaffirmed Equitas Small Finance Bank's credit ratings, with Tier II Bonds rated IND AA-/Stable for Rs. 1,000 crore and Certificate of Deposits rated IND A1+ for Rs. 2,500 crore. The bank's balance sheet shows significant growth over five years: total assets increased by 113.84% to Rs. 52,835.60 crore, total equity rose by 78.80%, investments more than doubled, and current assets surged by 67.91%. This financial performance indicates the bank's strengthening market presence and solid business strategy.

item.title: EIA Raises Brent Crude Price Projections for 2025 and 2026
item.description: EIA Raises Brent Crude Price Projections for 2025 and 2026 33 minutes ago The Energy Information Administration (EIA) has modestly increased its Brent crude oil price projections. For 2025, the forecast has been raised by $0.15 to $68.91 per barrel. The 2026 projection has been increased by $0.16 to $55.08 per barrel. These small upward revisions suggest a slightly more optimistic outlook on medium-term oil prices, potentially reflecting changes in global oil market dynamics.

item.title: Anupam Rasayan Expands US Footprint with $155 Million Acquisition of Jayhawk Fine Chemicals
item.description: Anupam Rasayan Expands US Footprint with $155 Million Acquisition of Jayhawk Fine Chemicals 4 hours ago Anupam Rasayan India Limited has approved the acquisition of Monitchem Kansas S.àr.l and its subsidiaries, including Jayhawk Fine Chemicals Corporation, for up to $155 million from CABB Europe GmbH. This strategic move aims to strengthen Anupam Rasayan's presence in the US market, providing access to niche chemical manufacturing capabilities and an established American customer base. Jayhawk Fine Chemicals specializes in custom manufacturing of fine chemicals, advanced intermediates, and active ingredients for the agrochemical, specialty chemical, and performance materials industries.
